reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel over the Labour Day long-weekend and there are a few things to be said about it. The best thing about the hotel is its great lobby - it has recently been re-done and looks excellent. The rooms are not renovated yet and so, do not even come close to being as nice. We stayed for 4 nights and the last 2 days they did not even clean the rooms. There were 4 adults in the room and we went through a lot of towels and when we phoned the front desk about it they said that they were busy but from what I could see there were more cleaning staff sitting in the lunch room than doing any cleaning. We were by the entry to the pool and the first night that we arrived there was a beer bottle sitting in the hallway and by the 4th day it was STILL THERE!! Same with a picnic table beside the pool area - there was a pile of bags and chip containers that sat on that table for 4 days!!! I have stayed in a lot of hotels and I have never not had my room cleaned - I do not think that they ever even vaccuum at this place - there were Smarties on the floor of our room when we got there and 4 days later and I bet if I went back today they would still be there. The hallways looked the same - like they were NEVER vaccuumed.
reviews.title: Great Lobby Bad Service!

reviews.text: When we called the front desk about getting some towels and to say that our room was not cleaned someone finally came with some towels but she looked angry that we had asked for some service. We also called for some extra glasses and nobody ever came - we waited 1 hour and still nothing- we had offered to go to the desk and pick them up but they said that we would just have to wait.
reviews.title: Kind of dirty, looked like a party place

reviews.text: I doubt that I would stay there again. It was filthy and had bad, bad service. Until the service level matches the lobby I'll stay somewhere else.
reviews.title: It isn't the Ritz, but it is worth the money
Only have good thigs to say!!!!
reviews.text: My brother and I stayed at the west end Sandman last summer and I was really surprised by the general untidiness of the hotel. It also seemed to be mostly occupied by a party crowd so you wouldn't want to bring your family there. It's not that there was anything really wrong with the place (little dirty) but for the money there are much nicer hotels.

reviews.title: Terrible hotel, bad service
reviews.text: I liked the few times I have stayed at the Sandman Inn. I know it is not everyone's cup of tea, but the few times I have stayed there, I thoroughly enjoyed it.
